DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Africa , Asia , Europe South America . The aim trial evaluate efficacy safety semaglutide once-weekly versus sitagliptin once-daily add-on metformin and/or TZD ( thiazolidinedione ) subject type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Semaglutide Once-weekly Versus Sitagliptin Once-daily add-on Metformin and/or TZD Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
